verses.verse: For <WG1063> the kingdom <WG932> of heaven <WG3772> is <WG2076> like <WG3664> unto a man <WG444> that is an householder <WG3617>, which <WG3748> went out <WG1831> early in the morning <WG260> <WG4404> to hire <WG3409> labourers <WG2040> into <WG1519> his <WG846> vineyard <WG290>.

And <WG1161> when he had agreed <WG4856> with <WG3326> the labourers <WG2040> for <WG1537> a penny <WG1220> a day <WG2250>, he sent <WG649> them <WG846> into <WG1519> his <WG846> vineyard <WG290>. penny: the Roman penny is the eighth part of an ounce, which after five shillings the ounce is seven pence halfpenny; about fourteen cents
And <WG2532> he went out <WG1831> about <WG4012> the third <WG5154> hour <WG5610>, and saw <WG1492> others <WG243> standing <WG2476> idle <WG692> in <WG1722> the marketplace <WG58>,

And said <WG2036> unto them <WG2548>; Go <WG5217> ye <WG5210> also <WG2532> into <WG1519> the vineyard <WG290>, and <WG2532> whatsoever <WG3739> <WG1437> is <WG5600> right <WG1342> I will give <WG1325> you <WG5213>. And <WG1161> they went their way <WG565>.
Again <WG3825> he went out <WG1831> about <WG4012> the sixth <WG1623> and <WG2532> ninth <WG1766> hour <WG5610>, and did <WG4160> likewise <WG5615>.

And <WG1161> about <WG4012> the eleventh <WG1734> hour <WG5610> he went out <WG1831>, and found <WG2147> others <WG243> standing <WG2476> idle <WG692>, and <WG2532> saith <WG3004> unto them <WG846>, Why <WG5101> stand ye <WG2476> here <WG5602> all <WG3650> the day <WG2250> idle <WG692>?

They say <WG3004> unto him <WG846>, Because <WG3754> no man <WG3762> hath hired <WG3409> us <WG2248>. He saith <WG3004> unto them <WG846>, Go <WG5217> ye <WG5210> also <WG2532> into <WG1519> the vineyard <WG290>; and <WG2532> whatsoever <WG3739> <WG1437> is <WG5600> right <WG1342>, that shall ye receive <WG2983>.

So <WG1161> when even <WG3798> was come <WG1096>, the lord <WG2962> of the vineyard <WG290> saith <WG3004> unto his <WG846> steward <WG2012>, Call <WG2564> the labourers <WG2040>, and <WG2532> give <WG591> them <WG846> their hire <WG3408>, beginning <WG756> from <WG575> the last <WG2078> unto <WG2193> the first <WG4413>.
And <WG2532> when they came <WG2064> that were hired about <WG4012> the eleventh <WG1734> hour <WG5610>, they received <WG2983> every man <WG303> a penny <WG1220>.

But <WG1161> when the first <WG4413> came <WG2064>, they supposed <WG3543> that <WG3754> they should have received <WG2983> more <WG4119>; and <WG2532> they likewise <WG2532> received <WG2983> every man <WG846> <WG303> a penny <WG1220>.
And <WG1161> when they had received <WG2983> it, they murmured <WG1111> against <WG2596> the goodman of the house <WG3617>,

<WG3754> Saying <WG3004>, These <WG3778> last <WG2078> have wrought <WG4160> but one <WG3391> hour <WG5610>, and <WG2532> thou hast made <WG4160> them <WG846> equal <WG2470> unto us <WG2254>, which <WG3588> have borne <WG941> the burden <WG922> and <WG2532> heat <WG2742> of the day <WG2250>. have wrought: or, have continued one hour only

But <WG1161> he answered <WG611> one <WG1520> of them <WG846>, and said <WG2036>, Friend <WG2083>, I do <WG91> thee <WG4571> no <WG3756> wrong <WG91>: didst <WG4856> not <WG3780> thou agree <WG4856> with me <WG3427> for a penny <WG1220>?
Take <WG142> that thine <WG4674> is, and <WG2532> go thy way <WG5217>: <WG1161> I will <WG2309> give <WG1325> unto this <WG5129> last <WG2078>, even <WG2532> as <WG5613> unto thee <WG4671>.

<WG2228> Is it not <WG3756> lawful <WG1832> for me <WG3427> to do <WG4160> what <WG3739> I will <WG2309> with <WG1722> mine own <WG1699>? <WG1487> Is <WG2076> thine <WG4675> eye <WG3788> evil <WG4190>, because <WG3754> I <WG1473> am <WG1510> good <WG18>?

So <WG3779> the last <WG2078> shall be <WG2071> first <WG4413>, and <WG2532> the first <WG4413> last <WG2078>: for <WG1063> many <WG4183> be <WG1526> called <WG2822>, but <WG1161> few <WG3641> chosen <WG1588>.

And <WG2532> Jesus <WG2424> going up <WG305> to <WG1519> Jerusalem <WG2414> took <WG3880> the twelve <WG1427> disciples <WG3101> apart <WG2596> <WG2398> in <WG1722> the way <WG3598>, and <WG2532> said <WG2036> unto them <WG846>,

Behold <WG2400>, we go up <WG305> to <WG1519> Jerusalem <WG2414>; and <WG2532> the Son <WG5207> of man <WG444> shall be betrayed <WG3860> unto the chief priests <WG749> and <WG2532> unto the scribes <WG1122>, and <WG2532> they shall condemn <WG2632> him <WG846> to death <WG2288>,

And <WG2532> shall deliver <WG3860> him <WG846> to the Gentiles <WG1484> to <WG1519> mock <WG1702>, and <WG2532> to scourge <WG3146>, and <WG2532> to crucify <WG4717> him: and <WG2532> the third <WG5154> day <WG2250> he shall rise again <WG450>.

Then <WG5119> came <WG4334> to him <WG846> the mother <WG3384> of Zebedee's <WG2199> children <WG5207> with <WG3326> her <WG846> sons <WG5207>, worshipping <WG4352> him, and <WG2532> desiring <WG154> a certain <WG5100> thing <WG3844> of him <WG846>.

And <WG1161> he said <WG2036> unto her <WG846>, What <WG5101> wilt thou <WG2309>? She saith <WG3004> unto him <WG846>, Grant <WG2036> that <WG2443> these <WG3778> my <WG3450> two <WG1417> sons <WG5207> may sit <WG2523>, the one <WG1520> on <WG1537> thy <WG4675> right hand <WG1188>, and <WG2532> the other <WG1520> on <WG1537> the left <WG2176>, in <WG1722> thy <WG4675> kingdom <WG932>.

But <WG1161> Jesus <WG2424> answered <WG611> and said <WG2036>, Ye know <WG1492> not <WG3756> what <WG5101> ye ask <WG154>. Are ye able <WG1410> to drink <WG4095> of the cup <WG4221> that <WG3739> I <WG1473> shall <WG3195> drink of <WG4095>, and <WG2532> to be baptized <WG907> with the baptism <WG908> that <WG3739> I <WG1473> am baptized with <WG907>? They say <WG3004> unto him <WG846>, We are able <WG1410>.

And <WG2532> he saith <WG3004> unto them <WG846>, Ye shall drink <WG4095> indeed <WG3303> of my <WG3450> cup <WG4221>, and <WG2532> be baptized <WG907> with the baptism <WG908> that <WG3739> I <WG1473> am baptized with <WG907>: but <WG1161> to sit <WG2523> on <WG1537> my <WG3450> right hand <WG1188>, and <WG2532> on <WG1537> my <WG3450> left <WG2176>, is <WG2076> not <WG3756> mine <WG1699> to give <WG1325>, but <WG235> it shall be given to them for whom <WG3739> it is prepared <WG2090> of <WG5259> my <WG3450> Father <WG3962>.
And <WG2532> when the ten <WG1176> heard <WG191> it, they were moved with indignation <WG23> against <WG4012> the two <WG1417> brethren <WG80>.

But <WG1161> Jesus <WG2424> called <WG4341> them <WG846> unto him, and said <WG2036>, Ye know <WG1492> that <WG3754> the princes <WG758> of the Gentiles <WG1484> exercise dominion over <WG2634> them <WG846>, and <WG2532> they that are great <WG3173> exercise authority upon <WG2715> them <WG846>.

But <WG1161> it shall <WG2071> not <WG3756> be <WG2071> so <WG3779> among <WG1722> you <WG5213>: but <WG235> whosoever <WG3739> <WG1437> will <WG2309> be <WG1096> great <WG3173> among <WG1722> you <WG5213>, let him be <WG2077> your <WG5216> minister <WG1249>;
And <WG2532> whosoever <WG3739> <WG1437> will <WG2309> be <WG1511> chief <WG4413> among <WG1722> you <WG5213>, let him be <WG2077> your <WG5216> servant <WG1401>:

Even as <WG5618> the Son <WG5207> of man <WG444> came <WG2064> not <WG3756> to be ministered unto <WG1247>, but <WG235> to minister <WG1247>, and <WG2532> to give <WG1325> his <WG846> life <WG5590> a ransom <WG3083> for <WG473> many <WG4183>.
And <WG2532> as they <WG846> departed <WG1607> from <WG575> Jericho <WG2410>, a great <WG4183> multitude <WG3793> followed <WG190> him <WG846>.

And <WG2532>, behold <WG2400>, two <WG1417> blind men <WG5185> sitting <WG2521> by the way <WG3598> side <WG3844>, when they heard <WG191> that <WG3754> Jesus <WG2424> passed by <WG3855>, cried out <WG2896>, saying <WG3004>, Have mercy <WG1653> on us <WG2248>, O Lord <WG2962>, thou Son <WG5207> of David <WG1138>.

And <WG1161> the multitude <WG3793> rebuked <WG2008> them <WG846>, because <WG2443> they should hold their peace <WG4623>: but <WG1161> they cried <WG2896> the more <WG3185>, saying <WG3004>, Have mercy <WG1653> on us <WG2248>, O Lord <WG2962>, thou Son <WG5207> of David <WG1138>.
And <WG2532> Jesus <WG2424> stood still <WG2476>, and called <WG5455> them <WG846>, and <WG2532> said <WG2036>, What <WG5101> will ye <WG2309> that I shall do <WG4160> unto you <WG5213>?
They say <WG3004> unto him <WG846>, Lord <WG2962>, that <WG2443> our <WG2257> eyes <WG3788> may be opened <WG455>.

So <WG1161> Jesus <WG2424> had compassion <WG4697> on them, and touched <WG680> their <WG846> eyes <WG3788>: and <WG2532> immediately <WG2112> their <WG846> eyes <WG3788> received sight <WG308>, and <WG2532> they followed <WG190> him <WG846>.
